plugins.name: Color Analyzer
plugins.description:
Color Analyzer is an intuitive Figma plugin that provides in-depth analysis of colors in your designs. Once you select an element, the plugin generates a square representing the analyzed color alongside comprehensive information:


Displays color values in HEX, RGB, and CMYK formats

Automatically calculates and shows contrast ratios against white (#FFF) and black (#000) backgrounds

Presents results in a clear, easy-to-read format next to the analyzed element


With Color Analyzer, you can quickly check WCAG accessibility compliance, optimize text readability, and ensure color consistency across your designs. Perfect for UI/UX designers who care about details and accessibility in their interfaces.
plugins.tagline: Detailed color analysis with HEX, RGB, CMYK values and contrast ratios for accessibility.

plugins.name: Monica 文案翻译
plugins.description:
Monica UI Translator: Your AI-Powered UI Translation Assistant


Effortlessly translate your Figma UI texts with the power of AI. Monica UI Translator is designed to help designers and developers quickly translate their interface content while maintaining context and design integrity.


🌟 Key Features:

• Batch Translation: Select a frame and translate all text elements at once

• Context-Aware: AI understands the UI context for more accurate translations

• Visual Preview: See and verify translations before applying them

• Flexible API Integration: Use your preferred AI service provider

• Easy Settings: Simple configuration with your own API endpoint and key


🎯 Perfect for:

• International UI/UX design teams

• Localization projects

• Design system maintenance

• Multi-language product development


💡 How to use:

1. Configure your API settings (one-time setup)

2. Select a frame containing text elements

3. Choose your target language

4. Review and apply translations with one click


⚡️ Pro Tips:

• Use frame selection for batch translation

• Preview translations before applying

• Easily switch between different languages


Note: Requires API configuration for translation services (OpenAI API compatible endpoints)
plugins.tagline: Your AI-Powered UI Translation Assistant

plugins.name: CoverCraft - Figma x Hashnode
plugins.description:
Are you creating cover images for your Hashnode Post ? Constantly downloading, naming, renaming files and switching platforms just to ensure your cover image looks perfect. We've been there, and we understand your frustration.


But fret not, because CoverCraft is here to save the day! Say goodbye to all the hassle and frustration. With CoverCraft, certainly no more platform switching.


Imagine being able to craft your cover images in Figma and seamlessly set them on your Hashnode blog posts with just a few clicks. That's the power of CoverCraft - simplifying your workflow and allowing you to focus on what truly matters: crafting your cover.


Features:


Firstly, To Unlock the full potential of CoverCraft you need access token. Don't have a token yet? No worries – create access token


1) Set Cover Images:


  • While plugin is open, Select image or frame containing your cover image. Next, choose the post in which you want to set the selected image as the cover, currently we support published post.
  • Finally, Click Set as Cover to apply the selected image or frame as the cover for the chosen post.


2) Generate your Imagination:


  • We discovered that users often struggled with selecting the perfect background image. To address this, Introducing Lexica AI into plugin to Generate Images from Prompt. Search for Background Images based on your imagination.
  • Open plugin and run in file where you aim to build Cover Image.
  • Navigate to the Search Cover Tab, Enter your imaginative prompt to initiate the Search. Browse through the generated images and select the one that resonates with your vision.
  • Witness the magic by clicking on image and make your cover. Once your newly created cover image is ready, set without ever leaving Figma.


3) Dark and Light Mode Support:


  • Our plugin seamlessly integrates with Figma's preference theme, offering support for both dark and light modes. This means that regardless of your chosen theme in Figma, our plugin will automatically adjust its appearance to match.
  • This ensures a consistent and comfortable user experience. If preferred working theme is dark, our plugin will automatically detect and switch to dark mode. Conversely, if you opt for a light theme, the plugin will effortlessly transition to light mode.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly Set Cover Images from Figma to Hashnode

plugins.name: Get in Line — Round off decimals in XY Coordinates, Width & Height
plugins.description:
Tired of those annoying decimal values in your Figma designs? Get in Line is here to straighten things up! 💯


Whether it's X/Y coordinates, Width, or Height, this plugin rounds off all decimal values to the nearest integer in just one click — making your designs pixel-perfect. No more awkward X: 325.49 or Width: 543.8. With Get in Line, you'll get clean, crisp values like X: 325 and Width: 544. ✨


💥 What It Does:

✅ Round off X/Y Coordinates — Converts decimal positions into whole numbers.

✅ Round off Width & Height — Keeps your shapes, frames, and elements mathematically perfect.

✅ Multi-Select Support — Select multiple elements and fix them all at once.

✅ Instant Feedback — Know how many elements were aligned after each click.


🚀 Why Use It?

Pixel Perfection: No more blurry layers caused by decimal positions.

Design Hygiene: Clean, rounded dimensions keep your layout sharp.

Speed Up Workflow: Align multiple elements in one go.

No More OCD Triggering Numbers: Forget about X: 135.72 — now it's X: 136. 😎


💡 How It Works:

Select one or more elements (Frames, Shapes, SVGs, anything!).

Hit the "Align" button in the plugin.

Boom! All decimal values in X, Y, Width, and Height are instantly rounded off.

You'll get a notification showing how many elements were aligned. 🎉

💎 Get in Line is perfect for product designers, UI/UX designers, and anyone who craves that perfect, integer-based alignment. Whether you're building a design system, creating components, or fine-tuning layouts — this plugin will keep your designs clean and crisp.


👉 Click 'Open' and make your elements fall in line! 🚶‍♂️✨

accepted.name: Shubhransh Bhaskar
accepted.description: Sharing my learnings through YouTube — Finding inspiration through Photography — Focused on creating a therapeutic experience.

plugins.tagline: Convert decimals into integers for Position XY Coordinates, Width & Height at once!

plugins.name: CTRL Var: Rename Variables
plugins.description:
Finally, CMD/CTRL + R for variables!

CTRL Var was built to give you many of the same renaming features available for layers - for variables.


Preview your changes

Easily view the variables in your collections, search results, and potential changes before updating.

  1. Scrollable list let's you see the full list and long path names.
  2. Change counts provided to help confirm the impact of the changes.


Search your variable tables

Use the search field to find variable names within a collection.

  1. Easily identify location, patterns, and inconsistencies.
  2. Search has no impact on changes - just a needed feature.


Set the scope of your name changes

Use the scope field to set a path to a specific group, which will limit changes to variables within it.

  1. Scoping must start from the beginning of the path to a group of variables.


Rename part of a variable's name

Use the match field to find a character or word to be replaced with something from the rename field.


Cut text before or after

Remove all text from before or after the matching text

Use the X → / X ← buttons or enter these short codes in the rename field:

  1. #!* (before)
  2. #*! (after).


Add incrementing numbers to your variables

Use the # ↑ / # ↓ buttons to enter ascending or descending numbers to matching variables names. You can also use these short codes in the rename field:

  1. #>> (ascending from top)
  2. #<< (descending to bottom)
  3. Use the number field to control which number to start or end with
  4. The number of < or > characters signifies the number of digits to be used. For example < is 1, << is 01, <<< is 001, etc.


Limitations

  1. Variables do not allow { } . $
  2. Variable names must be unique, no duplicates
  3. There is a chance the use of some special characters within your variables, such as # & < > * ! may have issues using certain short codes which contain those same characters.


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Rename variables like layers, CTRL/CMD + R style!

plugins.name: 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant
plugins.description:
Introduction

Slice Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed specifically for designers to efficiently export selected design elements. Whether you're working on web designs, mobile applications, or icon creation, Slice Export Assistant caters to your diverse needs.


Function Description

  1. Multiple Format Support: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  2. Multi-Scale Exporting: Easily set different export scales with automatic increments to save your time.
  3. Custom Suffixes: Assign custom suffixes to each exported file to ensure consistent and organized file naming.
  4. Batch Exporting: Export multiple files at once and automatically generate a ZIP archive for easy downloading and management.
  5. WEBP Conversion: Built-in WEBP format conversion to enhance image optimization efficiency.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: In Figma, select one or more design elements you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Right-click on the selected elements, navigate to Plugins > Slice Export Assistant > Export.


Configure Options

  1. Choose Format: Select the desired export format from PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, or WEBP.
  2. Set Scale and Suffix: Add the required export scales. Each time you click the "Add" button, the scale automatically increments.
  3. Customize Suffixes: Modify or remove suffixes as needed to fit your naming conventions.
  4. Export: Click the Export button. The plugin will export the files based on your settings—downloading single files directly or packaging multiple files into a ZIP archive for download.


Precautions

  1. Ensure Correct Selection: Make sure to select the elements you want to export on the canvas; otherwise, the plugin cannot perform the export.
  2. Browser Compatibility: WEBP format conversion relies on the browser's Canvas support. Ensure your browser is compatible.
  3. File Naming: When customizing suffixes, avoid using special characters to ensure the validity of file names.


介绍

切图助手是一款强大的Figma插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您高效地导出选中的设计元素。无论是网页设计、移动应用还是图标制作，切图助手都能满足您的多样化需求。


功能说明

  1. 多格式支持：支持导出PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF和WEBP等多种格式。
  2. 多倍数导出：轻松设置不同的导出倍数，并自动递增，节省您的时间。
  3. 自定义后缀：为每个导出文件设置自定义后缀，确保文件命名规范。
  4. 批量导出：支持一次导出多个文件，并自动生成ZIP压缩包，方便下载和管理。
  5. WEBP转换：内置WEBP格式转换功能，提升图片优化效率。


使用方法

  1. 选择元素：在Figma中选择一个或多个需要导出的设计元素。
  2. 运行插件：右键点击选择的元素，导航至Plugins > 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant > Export。


设置选项

  1. 选择格式：从PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF或WEBP中选择导出格式。
  2. 设置倍数和后缀：添加所需的导出倍数，每次点击“添加”按钮，倍数自动递增。
  3. 自定义后缀：根据需要修改或删除后缀内容。
  4. 导出：点击导出按钮，插件将根据设置导出文件，单文件直接下载，多文件打包为ZIP下载。


注意事项

  1. 确保选择正确：请先在画布上选中要导出的元素，否则插件无法执行导出操作。
  2. 浏览器支持：WEBP格式转换依赖于浏览器的Canvas支持，请确保您的浏览器兼容。

plugins.tagline: Flexible Multi-Scale Slice Exporting

120176.name: 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant
120176.description:
Introduction

Slice Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed specifically for designers to efficiently export selected design elements. Whether you're working on web designs, mobile applications, or icon creation, Slice Export Assistant caters to your diverse needs.


Function Description

  1. Multiple Format Support: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  2. Multi-Scale Exporting: Easily set different export scales with automatic increments to save your time.
  3. Custom Suffixes: Assign custom suffixes to each exported file to ensure consistent and organized file naming.
  4. Batch Exporting: Export multiple files at once and automatically generate a ZIP archive for easy downloading and management.
  5. WEBP Conversion: Built-in WEBP format conversion to enhance image optimization efficiency.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: In Figma, select one or more design elements you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Right-click on the selected elements, navigate to Plugins > Slice Export Assistant > Export.


Configure Options

  1. Choose Format: Select the desired export format from PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, or WEBP.
  2. Set Scale and Suffix: Add the required export scales. Each time you click the "Add" button, the scale automatically increments.
  3. Customize Suffixes: Modify or remove suffixes as needed to fit your naming conventions.
  4. Export: Click the Export button. The plugin will export the files based on your settings—downloading single files directly or packaging multiple files into a ZIP archive for download.


Precautions

  1. Ensure Correct Selection: Make sure to select the elements you want to export on the canvas; otherwise, the plugin cannot perform the export.
  2. Browser Compatibility: WEBP format conversion relies on the browser's Canvas support. Ensure your browser is compatible.
  3. File Naming: When customizing suffixes, avoid using special characters to ensure the validity of file names.


介绍

切图助手是一款强大的Figma插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您高效地导出选中的设计元素。无论是网页设计、移动应用还是图标制作，切图助手都能满足您的多样化需求。


功能说明

  1. 多格式支持：支持导出PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF和WEBP等多种格式。
  2. 多倍数导出：轻松设置不同的导出倍数，并自动递增，节省您的时间。
  3. 自定义后缀：为每个导出文件设置自定义后缀，确保文件命名规范。
  4. 批量导出：支持一次导出多个文件，并自动生成ZIP压缩包，方便下载和管理。
  5. WEBP转换：内置WEBP格式转换功能，提升图片优化效率。


使用方法

  1. 选择元素：在Figma中选择一个或多个需要导出的设计元素。
  2. 运行插件：右键点击选择的元素，导航至Plugins > 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant > Export。


设置选项

  1. 选择格式：从PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF或WEBP中选择导出格式。
  2. 设置倍数和后缀：添加所需的导出倍数，每次点击“添加”按钮，倍数自动递增。
  3. 自定义后缀：根据需要修改或删除后缀内容。
  4. 导出：点击导出按钮，插件将根据设置导出文件，单文件直接下载，多文件打包为ZIP下载。


注意事项

  1. 确保选择正确：请先在画布上选中要导出的元素，否则插件无法执行导出操作。
  2. 浏览器支持：WEBP格式转换依赖于浏览器的Canvas支持，请确保您的浏览器兼容。
  3. 文件命名：自定义后缀时，请避免使用特殊字符，以确保文件名的有效性。

plugins.name: Name Slayer
plugins.description:
Slay your layer names

  1. Select layer(s) with styles or variables directly applied to them (color, text and effect).
  2. Preview how many layers will be renamed, already match their style/variable name, have no styles applied, or if part of your selection has more than one style/variable applied to the same layer.
  3. Click Rename layer!


This plugin is a great complement to Styler, when style names and layer names become out of sync.


Notes

  1. Name Slayer supports color variables and color styles applied to either a fill or stroke, as well as text styles and effect styles.
  2. Layers with more than one style or variable can’t be renamed – layers must have a single style or variable to know what to rename it to.
  3. Styles which alias variables will be rename to the style, not the variable within.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.name: Text Contrast
plugins.description:
The fastest contrast checker in the galaxy! 


Text Contrast lets you instantly run a AA or AAA contrast report on all text across your selected mockups before you can blink.


Simply select a frames, groups, or components, and hit Check.

A detailed report will automatically display next to your artboard, giving you immediate feedback on color contrast compliance.


Hot Features:

  1. The plugin quickly calculates contrast ratios between text and its background, ensuring compliance with WCAG 2.2 standards.


  1. No need to be an expert, results appear instantly as a visual copy next to the original, with a focus on contrast and font size.


  1. The plugin won’t alter your design. Results are shown as an overlay, maintaining your original layout.


  1. Select your artboard, click "CHECK", and voilà! Get immediate results without leaving your workflow. 


How It Works:

  1. Easy Interaction: Select your artboard and click "CHECK." The plugin analyzes the contrast between the text color and its parent fill color.


  1. Focused Analysis: The calculation is based on the contrast ratio and font sizes, providing fast, accurate results for single color text layers. 


Limitations:

  1. The plugin operates over frames, groups, and components but only supports one artboard at a time.


  1. It currently does not support gradients or mixed color/font size text layers.


This is my first plugin, so feel free to share any feedback ♥️
plugins.tagline: Figure out text contrast issues reported directly on the artboard.

plugins.name: UIDraft: Material Preview
plugins.description:
Live Web Preview for Figma

See your designs come alive in real web environments – directly within Figma.


Functional Overview

  1. View Figma frame/group/components as they’ll appear in actual browsers
  2. Auto-converts Figma styles to CSS custom properties hierarchy


How to Use

  1. Choose any frame/group/component node in your Figma file


Operational Constraints

  1. Backgrounds using Figma's CROP fill mode might display unexpected aspect ratios
  2. Complex boolean operations may simplify during web preview rendering
  3. Any layer with rotation ≠0° may render with unexpected alignment.

Helps you clean up your designs by converting gradients to solid colors with intelligent options. Perfect for simplifying designs, improving handoff, or meeting brand guidelines.

  7. Preserves original opacity values

plugins.name: Variable Icons
plugins.description:
Convert selected SVG icons into components while assigning variables for streamlined design control.


Currently, the plugin supports only line icons using stroke color.


Benefits

  1. Centralized icon styling with variables and modes.
  2. Optimized icon components for instance swaps.
  3. Tailored for Lucide Icons.


Video Tutorial

Watch a quick demo to see the plugin in action.


Features

  1. Assigns variables to:
  2. Width and height of selected frames
  3. Stroke weight of the shapes of selected frames
  4. Stroke color of the shapes of selected frames
  5. Sets selected frames to auto-layout mode
  6. Positions the shapes of selected frames in absolute mode
  7. Converts selected frames into components
  8. Saves assigned variables as preferences within the plugin


Limitations

  1. Local Variables Only: The plugin supports only local variables. Shared library assets are not recognized, but local variables with alias values from remote libraries will work.
  2. Stroke Icons Only: Filled-style icons are not supported for stroke weight and stroke color variable assignments.
  3. Flattened Shapes Only: Icons containing ovals, rectangles, text, or groups will not have variables assigned.


Feedback

I’m a solo designer who learned coding with AI tools. This plugin has proved useful in my workflow, but I’m eager to hear how it fits into yours.

Comments and suggestions are welcome!

  1. Share your thoughts below
  2. Or email me: domas dot markevicius at me dot com
plugins.tagline: An easy way to convert SVG icons to components with variables.

plugins.name: Paper (Beta)
plugins.description:
The Paper plugin is a simple plugin designed to help users efficiently take and organize notes directly within their Figma files. Whether you're collaborating on a design project, documenting ideas, or adding context to your work, this plugin provides a seamless way to capture and manage your thoughts without leaving the Figma environment.


Key Features:


Heading Styles: Easily structure your notes with customizable heading styles, making it easy to organize your content.

Text Formatting: Use bold, italics, and other text formatting options to emphasize important information.

To-Do Lists: Stay on top of tasks with built-in to-do list functionality, helping you track progress and prioritize work.

Bulleted and Numbered Lists: Organize your notes with clean, easy-to-read lists for quick reference.

Privacy-Focused: All data remains within the plugin, ensuring that no information is sent outside your Figma file. Your notes are securely stored and only accessible to you and your collaborators.


Future updates will continue to expand on these features, offering even more tools to enhance your note-taking experience within Figma.


Perfect for designers, developers, and teams who need a flexible and private note-taking solution integrated directly into their design workflow!

plugins.name: Peppercorn - Find Centroids (Visual Center)
plugins.description:
Find the geometric center (centroid) of vector shapes.

This experimental plugin calculates the centroid to determine the center of shapes.

👉 Usage

  1. Place your shape in a container for better experience
  2. Select the shape
  3. Run the plugin


⚠️ Note

  1. This plugin is experimental and may not work perfectly for all shapes
  2. The centroid method works best for simple and symmetrical shapes
  3. For complex or highly irregular shapes, the centroid may not always represent the visual center


🛠️ Future Updates

  1. We plan to add visual guides to help you understand the centroid's position
  2. Considering additional methods like the smallest enclosing circle for more complex shapes

plugins.name: Ideas Spark Booth・Private Brainstorming & Retrospective Sessions
plugins.description:
Ideas Spark Booth is currently in beta. We welcome your feedback.


Ideas Spark Booth empowers your team with a powerful FigJam and Slides plugin for conducting focused brainstorming and retrospective sessions with complete participant privacy.


---


Share your ideas and submit your feedback at a single place: ideas-spark-booth.canny.io


---


Why Ideas Spark Booth


Engage with Better Brainstorming Activities

○ Set clear collaboration guidelines and establish time limits to maintain focus

○ Organize ideas into simple categories

○ Use FigJam for live brainstorming or Slides for instant team feedback


Enable Efficient Ideas Sharing

○ Track participation and engagement in real-time

○ Focus on creativity without interruptions

○ Review and refine before sharing


Present and Analyze the Insights

○ Look back at past brainstorming sessions

○ Export session data into presentation slides

○ Save your results as spreadsheets


Publish & Explore Activities

○ Store activities in the cloud

○ Share with other users

○ Browse and use community activities

Have Help

○ Contact support


Get Involved

Give Support

Made by Aurélien Grimaud, Senior Product Designer based in Paris.

Colorgen – Your Ultimate Color Toolkit for Figma


This is my first plugin! Transform your Figma workflow with Colorgen, the all-in-one plugin designed for modern creators who want vibrant and versatile color solutions. 🌈 Key Features:

  2. Interactive Color Application: Apply any generated color directly to your selected frames for seamless integration.
  3. Add to Canvas: Instantly add custom palettes and gradient scales to your Figma canvas for easy reference and use.
  4. HSL Color Game: Have fun and test your color-matching skills with a built-in color game.
  5. User-Friendly Design: Simple controls that enhance your creative process without complexity.


Elevate your design projects with Colorgen and make color exploration fun, intuitive, and impactful. Please provide feedback and any additional feature enhancements.

  3. Thinking about adding color palettes from images!

plugins.name: Alignify
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、FigJamで選択したノードを整列するための便利なツールです。水平方向や垂直方向への整列だけでなく、カスタム列数でのグリッド整列もサポートしています。また、ノード間の間隔を調整することも可能です。これにより、効率的で視覚的に一貫性のあるデザインを簡単に実現できます。


主な機能

  1. 水平方向整列：選択したノードを水平方向に1列で整列します。
  2. 垂直方向整列：選択したノードを垂直方向に1列で整列します。
  3. カスタムグリッド整列：選択したノードを指定した列数でグリッド状に整列します。
  4. 間隔調整：ノード間の間隔を自由に調整できます。


使い方

  1. 整列させたいノードを選択します。
  2. プラグインのインターフェースで列数や間隔を設定します。
  3. 水平方向整列、垂直方向整列、またはステッパーをクリック、もしくはドラッグします。
  4. ノードが設定に従って整列されます。


Plugin Introduction

This plugin is a handy tool for aligning selected nodes in FigJam. It supports horizontal and vertical alignment, as well as custom grid alignment with a specified number of columns. Additionally, it allows you to adjust the spacing between nodes, making it easy to achieve efficient and visually consistent designs.


Key Features

  1. Horizontal Alignment: Aligns selected nodes in a single horizontal row.
  2. Vertical Alignment: Aligns selected nodes in a single vertical column.
  3. Custom Grid Alignment: Aligns selected nodes in a grid with the specified number of columns.
  4. Spacing Adjustment: Allows you to freely adjust the spacing between nodes.


How to Use

  1. Select the nodes you want to align.
  2. Set the number of columns and the spacing in the plugin interface.
  3. Click or drag the Horizontal Alignment, Vertical Alignment, or the stepper.
  4. The nodes will be aligned according to the settings.
plugins.tagline: Multiple nodes can be easily aligned. The number of columns and spacing can also be easily set.
